episodes.synopsis: In this collection, B.O.B. attempts to outsmart Gen. W.R. Monger to break out of Area 52 -- the government's top-secret holding cell.
episodes.title: Play All Four: Spooky Stories: Volume 2

episodes.synopsis: Get ready for a spooky adventure as B.O.B., Doc and the Missing Link band together on Halloween to save their town from a takeover by zombie carrots.
episodes.title: Monsters vs. Aliens: Night of the Living Carrots

episodes.synopsis: The thrills don't end for B.O.B. and his friends as a birthday celebration turns into a plan for a big break-out from a top-secret government cell.
episodes.title: Monsters vs. Aliens: B.O.B.'s Big Break

episodes.synopsis: Someone just unleased the giant Mega-Megamind robot upon Metro City and the city's heroes, Megamind and Minion, must save the day.
episodes.title: Megamind: The Button of Doom

episodes.synopsis: Heimlich has cried wolf many times before, so Horst and Dieter ignore his warnings when a wolf moves in next door to the Three Pigs.
episodes.title: Shrek: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf

video.title: DreamWorks Spooky Stories: Volume 2
video.synopsis: The Shrek characters parody the music video "Thriller"; B.O.B. and pals battle zombie carrots; and Megamind faces the effects of the Button of Doom.
